search_results.snippet:
A LOT OF HAPPY TALK: This Welsh poet's "Fern Hill" says, "Now as I was young 
& easy under the apple boughs ...& happy as the grass was green".
search_results.title: Jeopary Questions page 225 - CHILDREN'S LIT - TriviaBistro.com

question: This Welsh poet's "Fern Hill" says, "Now as I was young & easy under the apple boughs ...& happy as the grass was green"
